layout.systemProtectionDescription: Automatic protection system for web servers

hero.description: NGINX Shield is an advanced security solution designed to continuously and automatically monitor NGINX server logs. Through real-time log data analysis, the system identifies suspicious behaviors and potentially harmful activities promptly. Upon detecting anomalous patterns or intrusion attempts, NGINX Shield immediately blocks compromised IP addresses, ensuring proactive and robust infrastructure protection. This approach effectively prevents cyber attacks such as unauthorized access attempts, DDoS attacks, and other common threats, ensuring service continuity and web security.
